wikipedia_page.main: William Bentham (birth unknown – death unknown) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1910s and 1920s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, England and Lancashire, and at club level for Broughton Rangers, as a wing, i.e. number 2 or 5.

response: * Billy Bentham won caps for England while at Broughton 1922 Wales, 1926 Wales, and won caps for Great Britain while at Broughton 1924 New Zealand (2 matches)

link_mentions.page: List of Great Britain national rugby league team players

response: * Billy Bentham, English rugby league footballer of the 1920s
